column1: Unsafe shell command constructed from library input
column2: Using externally controlled strings in a command line may allow a malicious user to change the meaning of the command.
column4: [["String concatenation"|"relative:///lib/samsung-remote.js:103:21:103:44"]] based on library input is later used in [["shell command"|"relative:///lib/samsung-remote.js:103:16:109:10"]].
